entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Super Mega Lucky Box
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š2,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 0,99Â â‚¬ [0,99Â â‚¬ ~ 2,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š0,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

In this spectacular game of colossal fun, reveal numbers one-by-one and close a corresponding square on one of your cards. Your goal is to score as many points as possible, and you'll do that mostly by crossing off the nine numbers printed in a 3x3 grid. Get three-in-a-row to unlock bonuses, which can help you close more squares and trigger even more bonuses. Use Lightning tokens to nudge numbers to your liking, but donâ€™t forget about Moon tokens to avoid an end-game penalty. At the end of a round, you score points for each card that you've completely marked off, with the points diminishing each round from 15 in round one to 8 in round four. After four rounds, you score 1 point for each two spaces Xed on unfinished cards. Together with your points from completed cards, stars and moons, this determines your total score. The App offers you weekly single-user challenges in 3 game modes with varying degrees of randomness, so you can compete with players from all over the world in the highscore lists. But of course you also can just play for yourself and collec tg various achievements. Awards 2022 Tric Trac Nominee 2022 Mensa Recommended 2021 Cardboard Republic Socializer Laurel Nominee

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

Driving Zone: Germany Pro - jogo de carros e simulador de corrida de rua sem anÃºncios e limites. Dirija com fÃ­sica realista e carros alemÃ£es lendÃ¡rios. Neste jogo sÃ£o apresentados protÃ³tipos de carros dos fabricantes alemÃ£es: desde carros urbanos clÃ¡ssicos atÃ© carros esportivos modernos e poderosos e carros de luxo. Cada carro no jogo tem suas prÃ³prias especificaÃ§Ãµes tÃ©cnicas e sons de motor. Corpo e painel bem detalhados criam o efeito de presenÃ§a total e realismo. O jogo oferece quatro pistas Ãºnicas com diferentes condiÃ§Ãµes climÃ¡ticas. VocÃª pode dirigir em uma rodovia de alta velocidade ou dar um passeio na cidade alemÃ£, que Ã© particularmente bonita Ã  noite. Se vocÃª Ã© um verdadeiro piloto extremo, deve dirigir na pista de inverno com uma perigosa estrada gelada. VocÃª pode escolher a hora de inÃ­cio do dia, que mudarÃ¡ dinamicamente. VocÃª tambÃ©m pode tentar dirigir em uma corrida especial ou pista de drift. Ligue o motor, pise no acelerador e persiga o mais rÃ¡pido possÃ­vel. Ganhe pontos ultrapassando carros de trÃ¢nsito. Ou vÃ¡ para a pista de corrida e tente ultrapassÃ¡-la no menor tempo para obter a recompensa mÃ¡xima. Outro modo Ã© o drift, onde vocÃª pode testar suas habilidades de drifting e ganhar pontos por Ã¢ngulos de derrapagem rÃ¡pidos e agudos. VocÃª precisarÃ¡ de pontos para abrir os novos veÃ­culos, modos e outros recursos do jogo. Este simulador de corrida oferece a possibilidade de escolher o estilo de conduÃ§Ã£o que pode ser tranquilo e seguro ou corridas extremamente perigosas. A abundÃ¢ncia de configuraÃ§Ãµes permite que vocÃª personalize um nÃ­vel de realismo da fÃ­sica do carro, desde nÃ­veis de arcade e simulaÃ§Ã£o atÃ© os mais realistas, como no difÃ­cil simulador de corrida em que vocÃª precisarÃ¡ mostrar suas habilidades de direÃ§Ã£o. CaracterÃ­sticas: - Sem anÃºncios. - Belos grÃ¡ficos modernos; - Recurso de tuning e customizaÃ§Ã£o do carro; - FÃ­sica realista do carro; - Alterar a hora do dia em tempo real; - 4 nÃ­veis para corridas de rua, muitas configuraÃ§Ãµes de pistas e pistas de drift com diferentes condiÃ§Ãµes climÃ¡ticas; - VisÃ£o em primeira pessoa / visÃ£o interior / cÃ¢mera cinematogrÃ¡fica; - SincronizaÃ§Ã£o automÃ¡tica na nuvem do seu progresso no jogo. Aviso! Este jogo Ã© bastante realista, mas nÃ£o foi projetado para ensinÃ¡-lo a correr nas ruas. Seja cuidadoso e responsÃ¡vel ao dirigir um carro de verdade. Divirta-se com a conduÃ§Ã£o virtual em trÃ¢nsito intenso, mas observe as regras de trÃ¢nsito e tenha cuidado em estradas reais.

O jogo de defesa de torres mais viciante estÃ¡ de volta. Bem-vindo ao Kingdom Rush: Frontiers! Maior e mais forte do que nunca, o Kingdom Rush: Frontiers eleva o patamar da jogabilidade incrivelmente acelerada e encantadora que fizeram a ediÃ§Ã£o original conquistar tantos prÃªmios e sucesso. Desfrute de torres, fases, herÃ³is e itens inÃ©ditos para fazer picadinho dos seus inimigos. (NÃ£o se preocupe, ainda temos todos os bons e velhos itens do jogo passado. Agora eles sÃ£o retrÃ´.) O Kingdom Rush: Frontiers tem tanto conteÃºdo, que parece um canhÃ£o refinado disparando alegria em formato de pixel bem no meio do seu rosto... E nÃ£o Ã© que a dor Ã© boa? DESTAQUES DO JOGO â€¢ Fortifique a fronteira em novas terras exÃ³ticas. Erga suas defesas em desertos, selvas e atÃ© no submundo! â€¢ Oito novas melhorias para torres especializadas! entry.title: Lumy
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š7,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 4,99Â â‚¬ [4,99Â â‚¬ ~ 7,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š4,99Â â‚¬

Compras integradas

  • All the Light (Huge Tip)ï¼š9,99Â â‚¬
  • More Light (Medium Tip)ï¼š3,99Â â‚¬
  • A Little Light (Small Tip)ï¼š0,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Lumy is a beautiful sun tracker + outdoor activities planner. - Perfect lighting for photos or videos? Done. - Sunrise hike or sunset walk? Easy. - Outdoor yoga or sunlight breaks? Covered. Whether youâ€™re chasing golden hour*, planning your daily dose of Vitamin D, or tracking moon phases for stargazing, Lumy helps you make the most of natural light. Now redesigned from the ground up - Lumy feels more personal, purposeful, and in sync with how we live. Inspired by sunlight filtering through a window, every view carries a subtle visual echo of light seeping through a pane of glass window. Introducing Modes: Switch between profiles like Daily, Photography, or Meditation to shape Lumy around your routine. See only what matters to you. Lumy also supports iOSâ€™s State of Mind feature, offering sunlight suggestions based on your mood entries in the Health app - a gentle nudge to step out and connect with nature. And with weather forecasts for the next seven days, you can plan ahead with confidence. Lumy calculates all sun and moon data entirely on-device. No tracking. No server calls. Only weather needs internet. Lumy works seamlessly across iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, Apple TV, and HomePod. One purchase, full family access. Features - Modes: Switch profiles based on your needs â€” from weekday planning to weekend golden hour. - Sun + Moon Tracking: Accurate data, solar compass, and future predictions. - Season Info: Both astronomical and meteorological seasons. - Remainders: Custom repeatable notifications. - Apple Watch: Complications, Double-tap, and Live Activities. - Widgets + Control Center: Quick access via Smart Stack and more. - Interaction Upgrades: Time travel slider, Quick Access Button, fluid animations. - Visual Feel: Simulated light, shimmering glows, and enhanced Classic visuals. - Accessibility: VoiceOver, Dynamic Type, Reduce Motion, and more. - Privacy First: Fully offline (except weather). Your data stays with you. - Localization: Available in Japanese, Chinese, French, and German. Lumy helps photographers, outdoor lovers, and wellness seekers stay in sync with the sun and moon. *What's Golden Hour? Golden Hour (or Magic Hour) is the short time after sunrise or before sunset when the light is soft, warm, and perfect for capturing stunning photos or videos. Sun Information Available: Sunrise, Sunset, First Light, Last Light, Golden Hour, Blue Hour, Astronomical Twilight, Nautical Twilight, Civil Twilight, Solar Noon, Solar Midnight. Moon Information Available: Moonrise, Moonset, Altitude, Azimuth, Transit, Transit Elevation, Weekly Moon Phase, Next Full Moon, New Moon, First Quarter, Last Quarter. Got feedback or suggestions? Weâ€™d love to hear from you! Reach out at hello@waplestuff.com.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Folium
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š5,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 2,99Â â‚¬ [2,99Â â‚¬ ~ 5,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š2,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Folium is a beautifully designed, high performing multi-system emulator that allows you to play video games from retro consoles and handhelds -- NOTE -- Folium does not provide any games or system files, these must be provided by the user Emulation may be slow on older devices depending on the console or handheld emulated -- NOTE -- Supported Consoles - Game Boy, Game Boy Color - Game Boy Advance - Nintendo 3DS - Nintendo DS, Nintendo DSi - Nintendo Entertainment System - Super Nintendo Entertainment System - PlayStation 1 Supported Controllers - Backbone One - Nintendo Switch Joy-Con - Nintendo Switch Pro Controller - PlayStation DualShock 4 - PlayStation 5 DualSense - Xbox Series S - Xbox Series X Folium is in no way affiliated with Nintendo. "Nintendo" and all associated game console and handheld names and game controller names are registered trademarks of Nintendo Co., Ltd Folium is in no way affiliated with Sony. "PlayStation" and all associated game controller names are registered trademarks of Sony Group Corporation
